title: 100 Bullets #1
author: Brian Azzarello
synopsis: A mysterious man named Agent Graves offers people who have been wronged a briefcase containing a gun, 100 bullets, and a license to kill without consequences, leading to a complex web of revenge and betrayal.

title: Akira #1
author: Katsuhiro Otomo
synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic Neo-Tokyo, a biker gang member named Kaneda uncovers a government conspiracy involving psychic powers and a mysterious figure known as Akira.

title: American Vampire #1
author: Scott Snyder
synopsis: In the 1920s, a new breed of vampire emerges that is immune to traditional weaknesses, and a young actress becomes the first American vampire, determined to use her power to take revenge on the Hollywood elite who wronged her.

title: Asterix the Gaul #1
author: Rene Goscinny
synopsis: Set in 50 BC, this comedy follows a small Gaulish village that resists Roman occupation with the help of a magic potion that gives them superhuman strength.

title: Asterix and the Big Fight-4
author: Rene Goscinny
series: The Adventures of Asterix and Obelix
synopsis: Asterix and Obelix must resolve a conflict between two Gaulish villages who are fighting over a stolen barrel of their favorite drink.

title: Asterix and the Goths-3
author: Rene Goscinny
series: The Adventures of Asterix and Obelix
synopsis: Asterix and Obelix travel to Germania to rescue a group of Gaulish prisoners from the Goths.

title: Astro City #1
author: Kurt Busiek
synopsis: A series of interconnected stories set in a city populated by superheroes, exploring the impact of their actions on the people they protect and the villains they fight.

title: Attack on Titan #131
author: Hajime Isayama
synopsis: The emotional and action-packed conclusion to the hit manga series, which follows humanity's struggle against the Titans, giant humanoid creatures that have nearly wiped out humanity.

title: B.P.R.D. #1
author: Mike Mignola
synopsis: B.P.R.D. follows the story of the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense, a group of agents who investigate and battle various supernatural threats. The series explores themes of horror, mythology, and the struggle against darkness.
